EmailTemplate.name: 2012 Announcement (all segments except E)
EmailTemplate.subject: 2012 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are pleased to inform you that you have been named a 2012 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}. Congratulations on reaching a level of excellence achieved by fewer than 7 percent of the professionals in the area.
Your selection is the result of a rigorous research process that included a regulatory and consumer complaint review, and an evaluation of objective criteria associated with those who provide quality services to their clients. In the end, you are being recognized by the largest and most widely published award program in North America.
As a 2012 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}, you are receiving an honor that reflects your hard work and dedication. We look forward to working with you to share your good news.
Sincerely,
Jim Olson, CEO Five Star Professional
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 www.fivestarprofessional.com
